rows.label: tev021701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Fraisie about the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Fraisie if anything is troubling her. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Fraisie for her thoughts on the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Fraisie if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0001
rows.name:
For two years after we left Earth, the Whale flew
aimlessly through the vastness of space.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0002
rows.name:
And after the xenoform attack, we ended up crashing
here on Mira. What a miracle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0003
rows.name:
What further proof do you need that our god is the
Bringer of Miracles, and that He protects humanity?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0004
rows.name:
I believe that the Bringer of Miracles will continue
to guide us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0005
rows.name: So let us pray together and show Him our thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0008
rows.name:
I've tried to tell the people who come to this cathedral
about the Bringer of Miracles, but so many of them
refuse to listen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Mira is a livable planet, with water to drink and air
to breathe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0010
rows.name:
What are the odds that we could crash-land on such a
planet without divine guidance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0011
rows.name:
The Bringer of Miracles is speaking to me even still.
"Gather followers and bring them unto me," He says.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0012
rows.name:
I must hurry! I need to gather kindred spirits and lead
them to the Bringer of Miracles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0020
rows.name: The Ma-non are a wonderful race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0021
rows.name:
Where others dismiss me out of hand, the Ma-non
listen to what I have to say from start to finish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0022
rows.name:
Of course, many tell me that they cannot believe in an
unseen Bringer of Miracles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0023
rows.name:
But I know that spreading word of His presence is the
first step towards Him being accepted as our savior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0027
rows.name:
More and more of the Ma-non have been willing to
hear what I have to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0028
rows.name:
What can I do to convince them of the power that the
Bringer of Miracles wields?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0029
rows.name:
I asked that to the Bringer of Miracles himself,
and He blessed me with an answer![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021701_MSG0030
rows.name:
I am having Malyteth assist me, for she always listens
so intently. Now it is only a matter of time before the
Bringer of Miracles becomes manifest![ST:wait ]
